ingredients.displayName: medium garlic cloves, minced or pressed through a garlic press (about 1 tablespoon)
high-quality white sandwich bread, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (about 3 cups)

steps.instruction: Adjust an oven rack to the middle position and heat the oven to 350 degrees. Combine the oil, garlic, and salt in a small bowl; let stand 20 minutes, then pour through a fine-mesh strainer into a medium bowl. Discard the garlic. Add the bread cubes to the bowl with the oil and toss to coat.

Spread the bread cubes in an even layer on a rimmed baking sheet and bake, stirring occasionally, until golden, about 15 minutes. Cool on the baking sheet to room temperature. (The croutons can be stored in an airtight container or a plastic bag for up to 1 day.)
